PAD_DiscoverBurrow.synopsis: When the player discovers the burrow where the ring is hidden. An animal dug up the ring from the grave and hid it here.
PAD_DiscoverBurrow.how_to_trigger: Successfully pass the hidden perception check where the ring is hidden.

PAD_FoundFootprints.synopsis: This PAD occurs when the player approaches a set of tracks near a ledge. If the player jumps down, they will find a burrow with a ring inside.
PAD_FoundFootprints.how_to_trigger: teleport S_SCL_SkepticalRobber_Grave the animal tracks are neaby near the ledge

PAD_ReadRobbersNote.synopsis: When the player reads the Skeptical Robber's note after having already discovered the grave or found the ring, they are reminded about that with this dialog. The top node is if you already found the ring. The bottom is if you read the tombstone but HAVEN'T found the ring.
PAD_ReadRobbersNote.how_to_trigger: Read the SkepticalRobber's note for the first time after having already read the wife's tombstone or found the ring.

PAD_DiscoverGrave.synopsis: Player finds the grave of Ellie May. It's been dug up with her bones scattered,
PAD_DiscoverGrave.how_to_trigger: |Pass a perception check when near the grave.|

AD_ReadTombstone.synopsis: When the player reads the tombstone, they make out the name of the woman buried there. This is connected to the skeptical robber situation.
AD_ReadTombstone.how_to_trigger: Interact with the Tombstone at the wife's grave.

PAD_DiscoverBurrow_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DiscoverBurrow_0.text: Something's buried in the dirt. Is that a femur?

PAD_FoundFootprints_0.speaker: Player
PAD_FoundFootprints_0.text: Paw prints? Where do they lead?

PAD_ReadRobbersNote_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ReadRobbersNote_0.text: Ellie May's ring? Guess I got there before him.
PAD_ReadRobbersNote_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Plays if you have already found the ring when you read the robbers note

PAD_ReadRobbersNote_1.speaker: Player
PAD_ReadRobbersNote_1.text: Ellie May - I think I read that name on a tombstone.
PAD_ReadRobbersNote_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Plays if you have already read the Tombstone when you read the robbers note, but haven't found the ring yet

AD_ReadTombstone_1.speaker: Narrator
AD_ReadTombstone_1.text: *Ellie May: my light, my hope, my joy.*
